commands: DPT.objects.processDirs(dirs=['sessioneye/array03','session01/array03'], cmd='import PyHipp as pyh; import DataProcessingTools as DPT; DPT.objects.processDirs(None, pyh.RPLLFP, saveLevel=1); DPT.objects.processDirs(None, pyh.RPLHighPass, saveLevel=1);')

DPT.objects.processDirs(level='channel', cmd='import PyHipp as pyh; from PyHipp import mountain_batch; mountain_batch.mountain_batch(); from PyHipp import export_mountain_cells; export_mountain_cells.export_mountain_cells();')
